message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this unique product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering its potential benefits for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $950,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000.  This is my final offer, as I already have a guaranteed buyer at a lower price.

Alice, thank you for your offer. I've carefully considered the value of the product and I'm willing to increase my offer to $1,000,000. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle and allows us to reach an agreement.
